posts.post_content:
"Someone asked me if my club* is for sale.  What a ridiculous question .... of course it is.  So is my hat, my watch, and my overcoat.  Anyone who wants them can have them at a price." -- H. Harrison Frazee, owner Boston Red Sox.

* T210-1 complete set.


[url]http://www.ebay.com/itm/-/371464150550?[/url]


net54 price --- $5,999.99 :)

Fun, fun, Scott :rolleyes:
